pageContext.claim: “So we're getting it down — $35 per month ... So it’s a massive cut — I guess, 60, 70%. Nobody has seen anything like this for a long time. Sleepy Joe can't do this — that, I can tell you.”
pageContext.analysis: Biden's campaign plan would go further than Trump, including allowing Medicare to negotiate prices with drug makers, restricting price increases to the inflation rate and limiting launch prices for new drugs that face no competition.
